message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product and think you'd really appreciate its value. I'm willing to offer it to you for $14,000. Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $12,000 is tempting, it's a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but $13,000 is the lowest I can go.  What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm not willing to go any higher than that. Can you meet me at $12,000?
